name: gpt-boost
description: Productivity-focused virtualization for faster, lighter ChatGPT conversations.

scripts.build: esbuild src/boot.js --bundle --outfile=build/content.js && esbuild src/background.js --bundle --outfile=build/background.js && esbuild src/popup.js --bundle --outfile=build/popup.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && node -e "require('child_process').execSync('npx esbuild src/boot.js --bundle --outfile=build/content.js --watch & npx esbuild src/background.js --bundle --outfile=build/background.js --watch & npx esbuild src/popup.js --bundle --outfile=build/popup.js --watch', {stdio: 'inherit'})"

author: Bram van der Giessen, Rich Alesi (punassuming)
